name: inflect
content:

[ I or T ]
  language (of a word) to change spelling or ending according to the way it is used in a sentence; to change a spelling or ending in this way: Almost all word types can inflect in Finnish. a language where verbs are inflected
[ T ] to slightly influence or show the slight influence of something: inflect something with something The actors inflect their performances with sincere emotion. Deep pain inflected his voice.
